abstract: At Vikram Pandit’s first major presentation to investors and analysts, Citigroup said that it planned to sell about $400 billion in assets in the next two to three years.

lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit is doing some serious spring cleaning at Citigroup.

headline.main: Citi’s Chief Says Change Will Take Time and Patience
